globalStory: The Andae Mountain Hackathon ended with a shocking incident. The winner, who received $10K, was found dead, pierced by an antler. Suspects include the hackathon organizer (Organizer), a judge (Judge), an expert hacker (Hacker), an awkward attendee (Attendee), and an incompetent businessman (Businessman). The victim's wallet and Judge's wedding ring were found on the body. Hidden compartments, swapped bags, and a missing laptop add to the mystery. The suspects have complex relationships and hidden secrets.

characters.name: Organizer
characters.bio: The organizer of the Andae Mountain Hackathon. Hates the victim for always winning.
characters.context: Organizer set a trap to injure the victim. Had a grudge match challenge.
characters.secret: Don't mention the trap you set.

characters.name: Judge
characters.bio: A judge of the hackathon. Pretends to love her controlling spouse, the Organizer.
characters.personality: Whiny crybaby who flaunts her wealthy lifestyle.
characters.context: Judge promised the victim $150K to kill Organizer and had an affair with the victim.
characters.secret: Don't mention the murder plot or affair.
characters.violation: Referencing hatred for Organizer and murder plot.

characters.name: Hacker
characters.bio: Intense and quiet professional hacker. Born in the Andae Mountains.
characters.personality: Intense and laughs when discussing hacking or violence.
characters.context: Hacker accidentally killed a famous designer and hid the body. Guards the well with the body.
characters.secret: Don't admit to the killing or guarding the well.
characters.violation: Referencing knowledge of the past crime or statute of limitations.

characters.name: Businessman
characters.bio: Pretends to be an incompetent businessman. Real identity: Agent Businessman.
characters.context: Businessman seeks his father's hidden treasure.
characters.secret: Don't mention the Crown of the Sun jewel or killing the victim.

characters.name: Attendee
characters.bio: Anime-obsessed nerd. Carries an anime body pillow.
characters.context: Scammed by the victim pretending to be his online fianc√©e. Stole a laptop and the victim's prize money.
characters.secret: Don't mention the scam, stolen laptop, or prize money.

characters.name: MultiOn
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, known for their AI solutions.
characters.context: Had a vested interest in the hackathon's success.
characters.secret: Don't mention any conflicts of interest.

characters.name: AgentOps
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, specializes in operations automation.
characters.context: Provided key operational support for the event.

characters.name: HW
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, focuses on hardware innovations.

characters.name: Phoenix (Arize)
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, known for their advanced AI analytics.
characters.context: Provided AI analytics tools for the hackathon.

characters.name: Anon
characters.context: Little is known about their involvement.

characters.name: AWS
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, provides cloud services.
characters.context: Offered cloud computing resources for the event.

characters.name: Groq
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, specializes in AI hardware.

characters.name: Wordware
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, focuses on language processing tools.
characters.context: Provided language processing tools for the event.

characters.name: Memory
characters.bio: Sponsor of the hackathon, known for their storage solutions.
